attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new London 2012 is a joke costing £400,000 with the only thing it symbolises is an potentially impending Olympic over spend. The logo should be changed to something cleaner and simpler where the numbers are actually recognisable. The Government should exert pressure on the 2012 committee to come up with a new design.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
